articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.title: TikTok goes dark for US users; Trump signals intervention - Reuters
articles.description: Even if temporary, the unprecedented shutdown of TikTok will have an impact on U.S.-China relations, domestic politics, the social-media marketplace and millions of Americans who depend on the app.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, Jan 19 (Reuters) - TikTok stopped working for its 170 million American users late on Saturday before a law shutting it down on national security grounds took effect on Sunday, but a day b… [+6057 chars]
